name: Website Development
description: Create modern business websites, landing pages and dashboards with hosting and admin panel options.

name: App Development
description: Build Android/iOS apps with Firebase backend, authentication, storage and admin panel (optional).

name: UI/UX Design
description: Design modern UI for apps or websites including screens, color theme, and clickable prototype.

name: Video Editing
description: Professional editing for reels, intros, promos with color grading, transitions and titles.

name: Brand Identity
description: Logo design, brand colors, social media kit, posters and banners.
